channel.title: How do you help spread the word of Auxy?
channel.description: I recently gave a speech at a Creativity Awareness Event at my school and I had got a lot of people interested in Auxy, what is some ways that you have gotten the word of Auxy out to friends, family, and fellow peers?

item.description:
They are stupid music is music how ever it’s produced

item.title: How do you help spread the word of Auxy?
item.dc:creator: anon6476606
item.description:
When IRL friends ask how I make my music, I say “go on the App Store and search for Auxy.”

P.S.

after this happens, one of 2 things can happen.

  1. “ooh, cool! oh darn, i have to buy sound packs.” me: “that’s fine, start without them and see if you like the app”.

  2. “whats the app store i have a n d r o i d” me: "henrik pls pls pls pls andoroido devs pls plsss "

Read full topic
item.source: How do you help spread the word of Auxy?

item.title: How do you help spread the word of Auxy?
item.dc:creator: anon73773654
item.description:
I entered one of my tracks, Liftoff, in this Creativity and Arts school-wide contest about a month ago. They just announced the winners yesterday and I was one of the winners. While announcing the top entries, they played my track and asked me how I made it. I said I used the Auxy Music Compisition Application. (I tried to make it sound fancy )

Around 100 people heard me say that, so I think some of them definitely searched it up on Google or the App Store.

When I heard of Auxy, it was like, a miracle. I’ve always wanted to make EDM and Future Bass songs, but all these DAWs like FL Studio were too expensive and made no sense. I downloaded Auxy first chance I got, and making tracks were suddenly so fun and easy.

Thank you @Auxy!

Read full topic
item.source: How do you help spread the word of Auxy?

item.title: How do you help spread the word of Auxy?
item.dc:creator: SusumuTouhoku
item.description:
SIDE RENDER the rhythm game is now on store.
Naoya Kubota「SIDE RENDER」

App Store

SIDE RENDERを App Store で

「SIDE RENDER」のレビューをチェック、カスタマー評価を比較、スクリーンショットを確認、詳細情報を入手。SIDE RENDERをダウンロードして iPhone、iPad、iPod touch で利用。


Developer now gathering some songs for app. Of course you can get payed if your song adopt.
Why don’t you make some song with Auxy and submit them?

Read full topic

item.title: How do you help spread the word of Auxy?
item.dc:creator: INDIR3CT
item.description:
I spam my friends with messages until they download Auxy, I wait about 5-7 minutes and then I get a message with them apologizing to me for not checking out Auxy when I first told them too… as well as a big thanks for showing it to them.

(This has actually worked with 4 of my friends )

Read full topic

item.title: How do you help spread the word of Auxy?
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Yeah I think doing remake videos will drive a lot of traffic. Here are some examples: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9qdQZXrg4vo
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fHKwRpen-Ho
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h3SEY5MOkN4

These all have more views than any of the top producers in the community have plays on a track I think.

Read full topic

item.description:
Just make good stuff, play it for other musicians who would appreciate it, and when they say “whoa that sounds good what did you use to make it”? You say “oh just a free app on my phone called Auxy, no big deal” works every time:
